passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(3) > div > ul > li:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
